com.kroy.game.scenes

Class GameScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kroy.game.scenes.Scene
      • com.kroy.game.scenes.GameScene

  • public class GameScene
extends Scene
    Class made as a result of refractoring by Septagon Used to handle the program when it is in the main game section
